channel.title: CVE Feed for Michael Torbert -- SimpleMap Store Locator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Michael Torbert -- SimpleMap Store Locator

item.title: CVE-2024-22282|2024-01-31T17:54:47.602Z -- Michael Torbert -- SimpleMap Store Locator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Torbert SimpleMap Store Locator allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SimpleMap Store Locator: from n/a through 2.6.1.
